text: As a #Cancer patient I want you to know #God gave us #Cannabis as our food and malevolent men took it from us. Then 1940's they erased all #Science from Print. We are in a #DrugWar on #Food 1915 #TheMan calls #Hemp #marihuana 1915 #ElPaso #Grift has been going over 100 years ~ https://t.co/QSL50pfyAy
